document.masterDocTitle: On some Maerid genera (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Maeridae) collected by the Hourglass Cruises (Florida). Part 1: Genera Anamaera, Ceradocus, Clessidra gen. nov., Jerbarnia, Maera, Meximaera, with a key to world Ceradocus

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: On some Maerid genera (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Maeridae) collected by the Hourglass Cruises (Florida). Part 1: Genera Anamaera, Ceradocus, Clessidra gen. nov., Jerbarnia, Maera, Meximaera, with a key to world Ceradocus

subSubSection.paragraph:
( Figure 9 )
Maera lucinae Krapp-Schickel, 2004: 28–33
, fig. 4–7.
Maera sp. C
LeCroy, 2000: 104 , fig. 145.

caption.paragraph:
Figure 9.
Maera lucinae
male 5 mm, FSBC I 45650. Mx1, maxilla 1; Mx2, maxilla 2; Mxp, maxilliped; UL, upper lip; LL, lower lip; Md, mandible; Md’, part of other mandible Gn1, gnathopod 1; Gn2, gnathopod 2; U3, uropod 3; T, telson.

subSubSection.paragraph: This is the only species here treated with Gn2 dactylus outer margin densely setose. Ep and Us smooth.
Lee County, Hillsborough County and St. Lucie County, Hutchinson Island, Gulf of Mexico , off west coast of Florida ( LeCroy 2000 , Krapp-Schickel 2004 ).
27–73 mm ; covering mat on top of the reef.
